description: Watch highlights of the final day of the Premier League season and vote for the best goal of the 2024-25 campaign.
title: Watch Match of the Day and vote for your goal of the season
title_page: Watch Match of the Day and vote for your goal of the season - BBC Sport
maintext:
Use play icon at top of the page to watch Match of the Day 2
Vote from a selection of goals for the Goal of the Season
